on reading compounds: 過【カ】surplus- (attaches to start of Sino-Japanese words), excess-, over-, per- (chemical with more of a certain element than found in other compounds of the same constituents)
看過【カンカ】overlooking, turning a blind eye
輸出超過【ユシュツチョウカ】excess of exports
kun reading compounds: 過ぎる【すぎる】to pass through, to pass by, to go beyond, to pass (i.e. of time), to elapse, to have expired, to have ended, to be over, to exceed, to surpass, to be above, to be no more than ..., to be excessive, to be too much, to be too ...
過ごす【すごす】to pass (time), to spend, to overdo (esp. of one's alcohol consumption), to drink (alcohol), to take care of, to support, to overdo, to do too much, to ... without acting on it
過ち【あやまち】fault, error, indiscretion, faux pas
過ちて改めざるこれを過ちという【あやまちてあらためざるこれをあやまちという】to err and not change one's ways, this is what it is to err
過ぎる【よぎる】to go by, to cross, to pass by, to float across
過ぎる【よぎる】to go by, to cross, to pass by, to float across
